results.title: Metformin treatment in young children with fragile X syndrome
results.text_hl: Studies utilizing the @SPECIES_7227 @@@Drosophila@@@ model and knock out @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Fragile_X_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D005600 @@@fragile X syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Fragile_X_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D005600 @@@FXS@@@) have found @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to rescue memory, @<m>DISEASE_601696</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:601696 @@@social novelty deficits@@@, and neuroanatomical @DISEASE_Abnormalities_Drug_Induced @DISEASE_MESH:D000014 @@@abnormalities@@@.

citations.NLM: Biag HMB, Potter LA, Wilkins V, Afzal S, Rosvall A, Salcedo-Arellano MJ, Rajaratnam A, Manzano-Nunez R, Schneider A, Tassone F, Rivera SM, Hagerman RJ. Metformin treatment in young children with fragile X syndrome Mol Genet Genomic Med. 2019 Nov;7(11):e956. PMID: 31520524
